timeline.author: awoods

replies.bodyText: I'm open to ideas. I don't know of a way of wiring a servlet's constructor because it needs to be instantiated by the container.
replies.author: pwinckles

 import io.prometheus.client.CollectorRegistry;
 import io.prometheus.client.exporter.MetricsServlet;

timeline.bodyText: Wondering if the default should be false, will most users care about this?
timeline.author: whikloj

replies.bodyText: Yes, I think that is reasonable
replies.author: pwinckles

replies.bodyText: Also, what is the impact (if any) by having this running but not actually using the metrics?
replies.author: whikloj

replies.bodyText:
There should not be a difference between collecting the metrics and not using them and collecting the metrics and using them.
There is a difference between collecting the metrics and not collecting the metrics, but I cannot approximate the memory and cpu cost.
replies.author: pwinckles

timeline.bodyText:
There are a lot of changes to this file just to add a single annotation: @Timed.
I would suggest only reformatting code that is being directly changed.
timeline.author: awoods

timeline.message: added jersey intergration and fixed one-click
